trans-unit.source: Controls run-time behavior of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> associated with an operation.
trans-unit.target: 控制執行階段行為的<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>與作業相關聯。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The XmlSerializerOperationBehavior enables control of <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> options, such as the <xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute.Style%2A> property of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: XmlSerializerOperationBehavior 啟用的<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>選項，例如<xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute.Style%2A><xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute>屬性</xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute.Style%2A></xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>的控制項
